response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which I believe could significantly enhance the efficiency and profitability of your business operations. Given its unique features and the value it can bring to your organization, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at an exceptional price of $950,000. This offer represents a substantial saving compared to the standard market rate and reflects my confidence in the product's ability to deliver significant benefits to your company. I look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your strategic goals. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 950000}
